Message: How did I perform, should I go signing in front of a public?
Your enthusiasm is commendable, and I see improvement over time. Technical aspects may need refining, but with dedication, you could captivate an audience. Believe in your progress.
How was it? Tomorrow, I had to sing for my moms birthday.

The sentiment of performing for a special occasion adds pressure, yet I sense your determination to make it memorable. Focus on connecting emotionally with the song, and the personal touch will shine through. Wish you every success.
Okay. It the first time I am doing, do I have a room of improvement?
Absolutely, everyone does, even seasoned artists. Embrace the journey of growth, work on breath control, diction, and stage presence. With practice, your confidence and skill will soar.
